sentences.en: a good many of us.
sentences.cn: 我们很多人。

sentences.en: A Wall Street Journal editorial encapsulated the views of many conservatives.
sentences.cn: 《华尔街日报》的一篇社论概述了很多保守派人士的观点。

sentences.en: Among his many hobbies was the breeding of fine horses.
sentences.cn: 在他的众多爱好中有饲养名马。

sentences.en: Anita Loos was in many respects untypical of the screenwriting trade.
sentences.cn: 在许多方面，安妮塔·卢斯看着都不像是从事剧本创作这一行的。

sentences.en: He entered for many competitions, winning several gold medals.
sentences.cn: 他参加过多次比赛，赢得了数枚金牌。

sentences.en: how many books did you sell?.
sentences.cn: 你卖了多少本书？。

sentences.en: Infectious diseases are spreading among many of the flood victims.
sentences.cn: 传染病正在遭受洪灾的很多灾民中蔓延。

sentences.en: many a good man has been destroyed by booze.
sentences.cn: 许多好男人毁于贪杯。

sentences.en: Many areas in the country'sinterior are unable to report Aids cases immediately.
sentences.cn: 该国内地的很多地区无法即时报告艾滋病病例。

sentences.en: Many farmers will then chase you off their land quite aggressively.
sentences.cn: 许多农民然后就会凶巴巴地把你从他们的土地上撵走。

sentences.en: Many of Britain's beaches fail to meet minimum standards of cleanliness.
sentences.cn: 英国许多海滩连最起码的卫生标准都达不倒。

sentences.en: Many of the clothes come from the world's top fashion houses.
sentences.cn: 这些服装中有很多出自世界顶级时装设计公司。

sentences.en: Many of the leaders have become hooked on power and money.
sentences.cn: 很多领导人都变得贪恋权力和金钱。

sentences.en: Many parents find it hard to discourage bad behaviour.
sentences.cn: 很多父母觉得要孩子循规蹈矩是件很难的事情。

sentences.en: Many students are not adequately prepared for higher education.
sentences.cn: 许多学生并未做好接受高等教育的充分准备。

sentences.en: Many women know how to carry out repairs on their cars.
sentences.cn: 许多妇女懂得怎样修自己的车。

sentences.en: many's the night he's been called out in the small hours.
sentences.cn: 他经常在凌晨被叫走。

sentences.en: moved three times in as many years.
sentences.cn: 在三年里搬了三次家

sentences.en: Not many expected Ferdinand to be such a success this season.
sentences.cn: 预料到费迪南德在本赛季如此成功的人并不多。

sentences.en: The printing press gave power to a few to change the world for the many.
sentences.cn: 印刷机赋予了少数人为多数人改变世界的力量。

sentences.en: The very notion of price competition is foreign to many schools.
sentences.cn: 价格竞争这个概念对于许多学校都很陌生。

sentences.en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentences.cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentences.en: There are many people who still find the act of abortion abhorrent.
sentences.cn: 仍有很多人对堕胎行为表示厌恶。

phrases.tran_cn: 在许多方面；用许多方法

trans.tran_en: a large number of people or things
The many means a large group of people, especially the ordinary people in society, considered as separate from a particular small group
a large number of people or things
